items.title: Monkey C Monkey Do
items.blurb: Created for a 3 day jam, an orthographic top down puzzle game where you must save as many stranded followers while heading for the GLORIOUS Banana Island!

items.title: Chains
items.blurb: An open-world game where you explore a whole world suspended in the sky, completing missions and discovering your past

items.title: Eternal Katana Slam
items.blurb: A Game made withing 1 day as a challenge to see what i could make in such a short time alone.

items.title: Emmett
items.blurb: A Game made during the 1 week Brackeys 2022 game jam, where you solve puzzles through the use of Emmett's shadows.

items.title: Deep Stone Cosmic
items.blurb: A 1 week Brackeys game jam entry, where you dive deeper into an undiscovered planet for your usual mining expedition... but something goes horribly wrong...
